div.p: To create a new Maven project, go to File/New project.. menu item. Among other project types, there are multiple the sample project templates for maven as well.

li.p: A project creation wizard for genapp project templates. Both the genapp plugin defaults and the user created ones.

div.p: You will be prompted for artifactId, groupId, version etc. Clicking the Finish button will create the project according to the template and your filled out values.
You can add custom project templates by various means.

li.p: The easier path is to create a genapp template and place it under ${maven.local.home}/templates directory. The genapp project wizard will pick that up along with the properties you define.
If you want more freedom on the UI side of the project wizard, check the Wiki pages for details on how to create and add your own templates. Any submissions are welcome.
